goal.ch: 高等會計學是一門極為靈活的會計學科,其活潑的個性另外展現在金融工具與避險會計章節.企業是承擔風險獲取報酬的經營就是風險的管理,由於金融市場訊息萬變,企業避險策略與時調整,避險會計也就因是制宜而生.亦講解企業得以用四大金融工具(遠期合約.期貨.選擇權.交換)的特性與平價方法,在針對三項主要風險管理項目(已認列資產或負債.確定承諾.預期交易)產生的不同風險,因不同避選策略及目的(公允價值避險.現金避險.國外營運機構淨投資避險),企業應進行避的會計處理處理.
goal.en: Advanced accounting is an extremely flexible accounting discipline, and its lively personality is also shown in the chapter on financial instruments and hedging accounting. Enterprises bear risks to obtain rewards, which is the management of risks. Due to the ever-changing financial market information, enterprises need to avoid risks. Strategies are adjusted from time to time, and hedging accounting is born accordingly. It also explains that companies can use the characteristics and parity methods of the four major financial instruments (forward contracts, futures, options, and exchanges) to deal with the three main risks. Different risks arising from management projects (recognized assets or liabilities, confirmed commitments, expected transactions), due to different hedging strategies and purposes (fair value hedging, cash hedging, net investment hedging of foreign operating institutions), enterprises should carry out Avoid accounting treatment.

outline.ch:
當企業因業務需要,從事進出口貿易.設立國外分支或其他國外投資事業時,在交易紀錄.損益認列及財務報表的表達上,皆因衡量單位涉及兩種或兩種以上或避而較為複雜.
依據財務報表是否以功能性貨幣編製,可將財務報表換算之情形區分為二大類:
一為由記帳貨幣換算為功能性貨幣:功能性貨幣為企業營運所處主要經濟環境之貨幣,故以功能性貨幣紀錄企業之各項交易,最能是當反映其財務狀況及財務績效.
二為由功能性貨幣換算為表達貨幣:表達貨幣為企業用以表達財務報表之貨幣.
outline.en:
When an enterprise engages in import and export trade, establishes foreign branches or other foreign investments due to business needs, in terms of transaction records, profit and loss recognition and expression of financial statements, the measurement units involve two or more types or avoid comparison. complex.
Depending on whether the financial statements are prepared in functional currency, the conversion of financial statements can be divided into two categories:
One is the conversion from accounting currency to functional currency: functional currency is the currency of the main economic environment in which the enterprise operates, so recording various transactions of the enterprise in functional currency can best reflect its financial status and financial performance.
The second is to convert functional currency into expression currency: expression currency is the currency used by enterprises to express financial statements.
